title: Mark your calendars: Bitcoin halving set for April 20th
description: Circle the date, folks! April 20th isn’t just for cannabis aficionados this year; it’s also when the crypto community gears up for its much-anticipated Bitcoin halving event. title: Mainstream media 2024 bloodbath – Google, Paramount, and Disney announce massive layoffs

title: Shiba Inu Could Go This High if it Gains 1% of Crypto’s $1.59T Cap
description:
Shiba Inu is currently valued at a modest $0.000009029 per unit. This reflects a 15% decline from its highest point in the past 30 days, which stood at $0.00001074.
